name: Low-Carb Zucchini Pasta
author: DinnerMomma
summary: If you are a pasta lover and need a low-carb version closer to the real thing than spaghetti squash, you have found your match! This is a great recipe for one; super-quick and super-versatile. Serve with your favorite sauce.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Cut lengthwise slices from zucchini using a vegetable peeler, stopping when the seeds are reached
Turn zucchini over and continue 'peeling' until all the zucchini is in long strips; discard seeds
Slice the zucchini into thinner strips resembling spaghetti
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir zucchini in the hot oil for 1 minute
Add water and cook until zucchini is softened, 5 to 7 minutes
